html:
men have not heard. The blessings the Lord will bring with him—including those of the millennial reign and celestial glory—are beyond the comprehension and imagination of man. There is no other who can save and bless as can Jehovah. His power and love can bring grace and mercy greater than we can even imagine (45:22; 43:11-12). As Paul wrote, "As it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him" (1 Cor. 2:9).

what he hath prepared. The Lord's blessings are already in place for the righteous, though we must endure to the end to receive many of them.

waiteth for him. Those who wait faithfully for the coming of the Lord.
